metadata.name: Stilo World - Track 02 - In The Metaverse
metadata.description: Experience a unique journey with "In the metaverse" by Dope Stilo. This rare digital collectible is expertly designed to incorporate sound, showcasing a new approach to music experiences. The customized digital space elevates the music experience to new heights, with the accompanying the album "STILO WORLD", serving as the perfect complement. Immerse yourself in a one-of-a-kind virtual experience with Dope Stilo and the "Dope Stilo Music Club".

attributes.value: Stilo World - Track 02 - In The Metaverse
